anl.verdi.plot.gui

Interface Plot

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    TimeAnimatablePlot
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlot, AbstractTilePlot, Contour3D, FastAreaTilePlot, FastTilePlot, LinePlot, ScatterPlot, TilePlot, TimeSeriesBarPlot, VerticalCrossSectionPlot

    public interface Plot
    Interface for Plot classes.
    Version:
    $Revision$ $Date$
    Author:
    Nick Collier

      • exportImage

        void exportImage(java.lang.String format,
               java.io.File file,
               int width,
               int height)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Exports an image of this Plot to the specified file in the specified format.
        Parameters:
        format - the image format. One of PlotExporter.JPG, PlotExporter.TIF, PlotExporter.PNG, or PlotExporter.BMP
        file - the file to save the image to.
        width - width of image in pixels
        height - height of image in pixels
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error creating the image
